item.description: #cfgmgmtcamp Monday schedule tips === Originally cfgmgmtcamp was a single track conference and although aspects of that still remains in 2019 it is clear that the organizers have taken a liberal approach to adding more tracks. This is awesome but it really makes it challenging to get an overview of what is happening. The amount of relevant content available is astounding and knowing that not all of them will be recorded leads to my first tip.
